DIGITAL MEDIA STUDIO
Some simple examples using digital interface to create original figures and designs, as well as modifications. Also, a case study using web development, design, graphics and animation.

  • Information Design
           Corporate graphics, Logos
           3 Dimensional graphics
  • Illustration Design
           Java manipulated images
           Cartoon Animation
  • Web Design & Development
       Web Interaction
           Buttons
           Animated Banners
       Microsoft IE Friendly (dhtml, javasript)
           Drag ball game -dhtml
           Oscar Wilde -dhtml
           Poem - javasript

       Case Study
           Ontario New Home Warranty Program
